markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Aquadynamic](/Traits.aspx?ID=469)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

This armor is designed for use underwater, with streamlined design and buoyant materials used in strategic places. You don't apply the armor's check penalty to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks in water or similar liquids.
name: Aquadynamic
